text: "Bed of Lies" is a pophttp://exclaim.ca/Music/article/nicki_minaj- bed_of_lies_ft_skylar_grey/hip hop song by Nicki Minaj. It features Skylar Grey on the song's chorus. It was released on November 16, 2014.https://web.archive.org/web/20141227105658/https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/bed- lies-feat.-skylar-grey/id942020959 It is from Minaj's third studio album, The Pinkprint. The song's lyrics touch upon themes of "heartfelt litany of grievances" about an ex-lover. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:2014 songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs
title: Bed of Lies
